ViewComponent

public ViewComponent(java.lang.String name,
                     IComponentChangeListener listener)
Handy constructor for creating a ViewComponent and attaching it to a ICcomponentChangeListener.

Parameters:
name - the name for the component
listener - the instance of IComponentChangeListener that will receive change messages from this view component.
